programme.title: Influential with Katty Kay
programme.desc: Author Ann Patchett tells Katty Kay about her writing process, the resilience needed to succeed and the unexpected joy of owning a bookstore in Nashville.

programme.title: The Big Cases
programme.sub-title: The Aristocrat, the Convict and the Missing Baby
programme.desc: An aristocrat and her convict partner go on the run with their newborn baby. The search ends in heartbreak. Family, friends, and witnesses reveal the background to this extraordinary case.

programme.title: Talking Movies
programme.desc: Presenter Tom Brook travels to Ireland uncover the growth of the Irish film industry. He revisits five Irish film classics including The Quiet Man, The Crying Game, and The Banshees of Inisherin.

programme.title: The Interview
programme.sub-title: Celebrities: Irvine Welsh: The Next Chapter
